sentences.sContent: Manage customer expectations through effective and thorough point-of-sale training techniques.
sentences.sContent_eng: Manage customer expectations through effective and thorough point-of-sale training techniques.
sentences.sCn: 通过使用有效和细致的销售技巧，为顾客提供超值的服务。

sentences.sContent: Convenience store solutions that incorporate point-of-sale with back off ice and offer management features.
sentences.sContent_eng: Convenience store solutions that incorporate point-of-sale with back off ice and offer management features.
sentences.sCn: 将销售点与事务部门和企业管理功能结合在一起的便利店解决方案。

sentences.sContent: Additionally, ICICI Bank will also set up point-of-sale (POS) machines at fertilizer and seed outlets to help farmers pay using a debit card.
sentences.sContent_eng: Additionally, ICICI Bank will also set up point-of-sale (POS) machines at fertilizer and seed outlets to help farmers pay using a debit card.
sentences.sCn: 此外，印度工业信贷投资银行还会在肥料和种子销售点，设立零售终端（POS机）设备，帮助农民使用借记卡来支付费用。
